title: IT/Business Resources Consultant
description: Provide direct support to lenders and brokers on a proprietary loan origination system. Work with other IT teams (Developers, QAs, and product owners) on major application features, updates and troubleshooting. Create documentation for step-by-step troubleshooting and workarounds for brokers and lenders. Assist in deploying and supporting a loan origination system through SalesForce/EPIC and have helped to create a ticketing system for brokers.

title: Senior Support Analyst
description: Problem solving, basic and advance, issues presented by employees on Mac OS and also Windows devices. Application owner for Xerox, printing devices, and applying printer repairs. Able to assist customers with account support and Application support. Meticulous competency in creating solutions and presenting products to customers. Interactive and responsive to all submitted support tickets for the company. Direct conatact for executive support for the CEO, COO, SVP, CFO, CHO, CIO of LifeWay.
